skills.name: skills
skills.description: View a dashboard of all of your skills, or information on a specific skill.

skills_list.name: list
skills_list.description: View a list of all available skills

skills_view.name: view
skills_view.description: View information on a specific skill.

skill.name: skill
skill.description: The skill to view information on.

train.name: train
train.description: Train a skill. You must have unlocked the skill first.

ping.name: ping
ping.description: Pong! Sends the bot's API latency.

invite.name: invite
invite.description: Gives you a link to invite the bot to your server.

vote.name: vote
vote.description: Gives you a link to vote for the bot on top.gg.

settings.name: settings
settings.description: View your current settings and/or change them.

settings_set.name: set
settings_set.description: View your current settings and/or change them.

settings_prefix.name: prefix
settings_prefix.description: View your server's prefixes for traditional prefix commands.

settings_prefix_list.name: list
settings_prefix_list.description: View your server's prefixes for traditional prefix commands.

settings_prefix_add.name: add
settings_prefix_add.description: Add a prefix to your server's prefixes.

settings_prefix_remove.name: remove
settings_prefix_remove.description: Remove a prefix from your server's prefixes.

settings_prefix_clear.name: clear
settings_prefix_clear.description: Clear all of your server's prefixes.

settings_prefix_overwrite.name: overwrite
settings_prefix_overwrite.description: Removes your server's previous prefixes and replaces them with the specified ones.

cooldowns_remind.name: remind
cooldowns_remind.description: Reminds you when a command is available to be used again.

cmd.name: command
cmd.description: The command to remind you about.

help_guide.name: guide
help_guide.description: Sends an in-depth guide on how to use this bot.

help_commands.name: commands
help_commands.description: Browse the commands Coined has to offer.

category.name: category
category.description: The category to view commands from.

help_command.name: command
help_command.description: Learn more about a specific command.

cmd.name: command
cmd.description: The command to learn more about.

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount of coins to withdraw from your bank. Use "all" to withdraw all coins.

deposit.name: deposit
deposit.description: Deposit coins from your wallet into your bank.

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount of coins to deposit into your bank. Use "all" to deposit all coins.

shop.name: shop
shop.description: View the item shop, or view information on a specific item.

item.name: item
item.description: The item to view specific information on.

quantity.name: quantity
quantity.description: How many of the item to purchase. Use "max" to buy as many as possible.

sell.name: sell
sell.description: Sell items from your inventory for coins.

quantity.name: quantity
quantity.description: How many of the item to sell. Use "all" to sell all.

sell-bulk.name: sell-bulk
sell-bulk.description: Sell items in your inventory in bulk by rarity and/or category.

rarity.name: rarity
rarity.description: The rarity of the items to sell. Defaults to common/uncommon/rare.

category.name: category
category.description: The category of items to sell. See /help command sell-bulk for more information on defaults.

keep_one.name: keep-one
keep_one.description: Whether to keep one of every item that would otherwise be sold.

quantity.name: quantity
quantity.description: How many of the item to use. Note that some items may not be usable in bulk.

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Remove the effects of active items.

backpacks.name: backpacks
backpacks.description: View the backpack shop and manage your backpacks.

repair.name: repair
repair.description: Repair a repairable item at the repair shop.

share.name: share
share.description: Share coins or items from your inventory with another user.

user.name: user
user.description: The user to give coins or items to.

quantity.name: quantity
quantity.description: How many coins or how many of the item to share

item.name: item
item.description: The item to share. If not provided, will share coins.

drop.name: drop
drop.description: Drop coins or items from your inventory into the chat.

quantity.name: quantity
quantity.description: How many coins or how many of the item to drop

item.name: item
item.description: The item to drop. If not provided, will drop coins.

craft.name: craft
craft.description: Craft items from your inventory to make new ones!

prestige.name: prestige
prestige.description: Prestige and start over in exchange for long-term multipliers.

invest.name: invest
invest.description: Invest your coins and potentially get more money.

crime.name: crime
crime.description: Commit a crime and hope for profit.

fish.name: fish
fish.description: Use your fishing pole to fish for fish and sell them for profit!

dig.name: dig
dig.description: Dig up items from the ground and sell them for profit!

chop.name: chop
chop.description: Chop down trees for wood! Wood can be sold for profit, or used to craft many items.

trivia.name: trivia
trivia.description: Answer trivia questions to gain coins and intelligence!

rob.name: rob
rob.description: Attempt to rob someone of their coins!

quests.name: quests
quests.description: View your current quests and progress.

quests_view.name: view
quests_view.description: View your current quests and progress.

quests_pass.name: pass
quests_pass.description: View your quest pass tier and quest rewards!

roll.name: roll
roll.description: You and I each will roll a pair of dice. The one with the higher sum wins!

bet.name: bet
bet.description: The amount of coins to bet. Must be between 200 and 500,000. Use "max" to bet as many coins as…

slots.name: slots
slots.description: Spin the slot machine and earn coins for matching symbols!

bet.name: bet
bet.description: The amount of coins to bet. Must be between 200 and 500,000. Use "max" to bet as many coins as…

scratch.name: scratch
scratch.description: Scratch a scratch-off ticket and hope for profit.

bet.name: bet
bet.description: The amount of coins to bet. Must be between 500 and 500,000. Use "max" to bet as many coins as…

blackjack.name: blackjack
blackjack.description: Bet your coins in a game of Blackjack.

bet.name: bet
bet.description: The amount of coins to bet. Must be between 500 and 500,000. Use "max" to bet as many coins as…

mines.name: mines
mines.description: Win big by collecting as many gems as possible without hitting any mines.

bet.name: bet
bet.description: The amount of coins to bet. Must be between 100 and 500,000. Use "max" to bet as many coins as…

size.name: size
size.description: The size of the grid (you will get a NxN grid). Defaults to 4.

mines.name: mines
mines.description: The number of mines planted. Must be less than (size * size). Defaults to 1.

poker.name: poker
poker.description: Play a game of Texas Hold'em Poker with your friends.

buy_in.name: buy_in
buy_in.description: The amount of coins the players should start with. Must be between 500 and 500,000.

small_blind.name: small_blind
small_blind.description: The amount of coins the small blind should be. Must be between 10 and 5,000

big_blind.name: big_blind
big_blind.description: The amount of coins the big blind should be. Must be between 20 and 10,000

work.name: work
work.description: Work your job and earn some money.

work_start.name: start
work_start.description: Work your job and earn some money.

work_view.name: view
work_view.description: View information regarding your current job.

work_info.name: info
work_info.description: See details about a specific job.

job.name: job
job.description: The job you want to apply for.

hunt.name: hunt
hunt.description: Hunt for animals, catch them, and raise them as pets for special powers!

pets_info.name: info
pets_info.description: View information on a particular pet.

pet.name: pet
pet.description: The pet to view information on.

pets_equip.name: equip
pets_equip.description: Equip a pet. This will activate its effects and abilities.

pets_unequip.name: unequip
pets_unequip.description: Unequip a pet. This will remove its effects and abilities.

pets_swap.name: swap
pets_swap.description: Swap an equipped pet with an unequipped pet.

to_unequip.name: to_unequip
to_unequip.description: The pet to unequip and replace.

feed.name: feed
feed.description: Feed a pet food to give it energy.

balance.name: balance
balance.description: View your wallet and bank balance, or optionally, someone elses.

user.name: user
user.description: The user to view the balance of.

level.name: level
level.description: View your current level and experience, or optionally, someone elses.

user.name: user
user.description: The user to view the level of.

multiplier.name: multiplier
multiplier.description: View a detailed breakdown of all multipliers.

leaderboard.name: leaderboard
leaderboard.description: View the richest people in terms of coins (or level) in your server.

is_global.name: global
is_global.description: Whether to show the global leaderboard instead of the server leaderboard.

inventory.name: inventory
inventory.description: View your inventory, or optionally, someone elses.

user.name: user
user.description: The user to view the inventory of.

book.name: book
book.description: View a summary of all unique items you have discovered (and what you are missing).

rarity.name: rarity
rarity.description: Show only items of this rarity.

category.name: category
category.description: Show only items from this category.

notifications_view.name: view
notifications_view.description: View information on a specific notification.

index.name: index
index.description: The index of the notification to view.

farm.name: farm
farm.description: View your farm and it's crops.

farm_view.name: view
farm_view.description: View your farm and it's crops.

farm_buy.name: buy
farm_buy.description: Buy the area of land located at the given coordinate.

coordinate.name: coordinate
coordinate.description: The location of the area of land you want to buy, e.g. "A1" or "F6".

farm_sell.name: sell
farm_sell.description: Sell a patch of land you own for 1/5 it's original price back.

coordinate.name: coordinate
coordinate.description: The location of the area of land you want to sell, e.g. "A1" or "F6".

farm_info.name: info
farm_info.description: View information about a crop or a specific crop at a specific coordinate.

coordinate_or_crop.name: coordinate_or_crop
coordinate_or_crop.description: The crop to view information on. Can be a specific crop (e.g. "A1") or a crop name (e.g. "corn").

plant.name: plant
plant.description: Plant a crop (or multiple) in your farm.

coordinates.name: coordinates
coordinates.description: The coordinates to plant at. Can be a single coordinate ("A1") or multiple coordinates ("A1 A2 A3").

crop.name: crop
crop.description: The name of the crop to plant.
